This update is all about improving the app performance to ensure you can easily tune into the practice. We've also added new tracks - check now & play the hottest songs on the piano!
comments: The moment I start the app it pushed me to subscribe and pay or 3 day trial which obviously one would forget to cancel. Dear app owners, if you want people to use your app, keep the free option open. Majority will not pay so heavy for an app! I literally installed, tried to use and un-installed. Literally 5 minutes work, useless.

the app is good for beginners like me (trying to expand on what i can play. at the moment only the guitar) but like others have said in the past, the game dosent register when you try to play faster. in my opinion it isn't much of a problem but would be nice if it was fixed. overall the app is good!

9/26/2019 - App is slow. I just timed it. Time I tapped on the icon to the time keyboard appeared: **12 seconds** It shows you two ads that are hard to get rid of. The final straw was yesterday, when they sent a spam notification asking you to use the app. 1/21/2020 - Can't figure out how to try keyboard for free, without purchasing a subscription with credit card. There's a free three day trial, but I don't want to deal with hassle of canceling.

the game is slow on my note 9. if you try to play a fast trill the sound won't even register anymore, the app can't handle it. also the app has too many ads. I'm a music student trying to use this to find my key to play the melody I'm trying to sing on this small keyboard and this app is terrible for that. get add Everytime I reopen the app. their strategy is to annoy into buying the ad free version. and the price is so bad, what am I paying for then if it's free. don't get if annoyed by ads

I did give it five stars beforebut now that I'm noticingthat this appor the makers are actually crossing my account and also using information from anotherlike credit card numbers and credit card informationand simplyconverting it into this deviceand usingthe information to pay out$89.99they charged me twiceactually charge mymother-in-law'saccount so if there's any explanation for this then please I'm all ears

title: Web Video Cast | Browser to TV/Chromecast/Roku/+
description:
Web Video Caster® allows you to watch on your TV videos from your favorite websites including movies, TV shows, live streams of news, sports, and IPTV. It also lets you cast local videos stored on your phone. Photos and audio files are also supported. Subtitles are detected on the web page, you can also use your own subtitles, or you can use the integrated search of OpenSubtitles.org. 


SUPPORTED STREAMING DEVICES
Web Video Caster® supports the most popular streaming devices, allowing your TV to stream videos directly from the web. 

• Chromecast. 
• Roku. 
• DLNA receivers. 
• Amazon Fire TV and Fire TV Stick. 
• Smart TVs: LG Netcast and WebOS, Samsung, Sony, and others*. 
• PlayStation 4 - by using its web browser. 
• Most web browsers by visiting http://cast2tv.app (PS4, Smart TVs, other consoles and set top boxes). 
• And more. 

*If you experience compatibility issues, contact us and include the brand and model number. 

SUPPORTED MEDIA
• HLS live streams in M3U8 format, where supported by your streaming device. 
• Movies and TV shows. 
• MP4 videos. 
• Live news and sports. 
• Any HTML5 videos*. 
• IPTV (M3U8, W3U, RSS). 
• Photos. 
• Audio files including music. 

*Your streaming device must be capable of decoding the video you are playing. Web Video Cast™ does not perform any video/audio decoding or transcoding. 

GET STARTED
Follow these simple step-by-step instructions to start streaming:
1.- Browse the web or the local file explorer to find the video, audio or photo you want to cast to your tv. 
2.- If the video or audio is on a website, try to play the video inside the web page. If it is a photo, you can long press on it to cast it. 
3.- Connect to your streaming device to cast the video, music, or picture. 

PREMIUM FEATURES**
• No in-app advertising. 
• Bookmarks. 
• Home page setting. 
• Video history. 
• Queue. 
• Homescreen shortcut. 
• Most visited site. 

**This functionality does not apply universally to all streaming devices.  

LIMITATIONS & DISCLOSURES
As with all apps, there are some limitations we are aware of and want you to know about up front. 

• We are in no way associated with any web media providers and we do not have control over the content they provide. 
• The app does not support tab casting, like the Chromecast extension for the PC web browser. 
• We cannot do anything to fix issues that arise on the server side (media content provider) such as failure to play or buffering, which is especially common during heavy load times and weekends. 
• Refunds are only issued within 24 hours of purchase and you must submit the order number in text, not a screenshot. 

SHARE YOUR FEEDBACK
We are committed to open communication with our users. Please contact us first with any questions or support issues before leaving a review. We will respond and address your concerns promptly. Contact us through our user community https://wvc.page.link/c or https://wvc.page.link/f our website contact form.

PERMISSIONS
• Phone state - To allow the pausing of videos on incoming phone calls. 
• Wi-Fi connection information - Required for streaming devices and for the browser. 
• Photos/Media/Files (storage in general) - Required for the download functionality. 
• In-app purchases - For premium version. 
• Wake-lock - To keep phone awake while routing videos through phone. Should only affect live streams and authenticated videos. 
• Accounts/Identity - Required by Google Play Services (7.5+). 
• Location - This is only requested on devices with Android 6+ so the user gets a chance to decide and it is only requested when the website you are browsing wants to know your location. You can always say deny it, it will not affect anything other than that website.

recentChanges:
Added alternative Chromecast receiver for m3u8 issues. You have to enable it under settings. This is a test receiver and you should only use it if you have problems with m3u8 videos freezing the Chromecast.

Reduced apk size.
comments: Web Video Caster is the best app for casting to your tv. It efficiently takes care of all the annoying pop up ads. It is very user friendly and has loads of extra features and setting choices. The customer service is second to none. Response is usually within half hour (even on holidays) and your issue is either resolved immediately or they work with you to get it resolved. Great job across the board!! I highly recommend purchasing this app.

I gave this a 1 star earlier and want to revise my experience... I was immediately contacted by their support team who walked me through a step by step process to get it working. I realize I had the wrong expectation. I wanted phone mirroring, which is not what this is. This app allows casting apps or web based sites to cast via WiFi to your smart TV/Roku like device. Still somewhat complicated, but they were very accommodating.

The free version has worked great for my dlna streaming. I definitely will be supporting the developer in purchasing the premium version. I've tried my factory version, several options available through the app store and even a few apk options not available here. Finally tried this one on accident and it has worked for every format I've tried. I haven't even had to change my phone's battery optimization settings. My search is finally over. The ads aren't an issue at all.

**Issue appears to just be me, Devs are really helpful in trying to figure out why it's happening. Thank you** I love this app but recently I keep encountering video server errors with some websites that tend to have a lot of popups (some that are infested with them are fine, oddly enough). Though I disabled all adblocking options, cleared the cache and it still happens. Doesn't happen on browsers like Chrome and Rocketshield's Adblocker Browser. One example is 9anime.to, please fix this

Great app! Works better than expected! Also 'seems' to use less wifi signal than PS4 for watching youtube and internet videos. Before using this app, my ps4 was VERY laggy to the point it was unwatchable. Now the signal goes through my phone straight to my tv. Im so happy I found an app thats works as it should! A great purchase! Definite keeper!

title: Google Drive
description:
Google Drive is a safe place for all your files and puts them within reach from any smartphone, tablet, or computer. Files in Drive – like your videos, photos, and documents – are backed up safely so you can’t lose them. Once there, you can easily invite others to view, edit, or leave comments on any of your files or folders.

With Drive, you can:

- Safely store your files and access them from anywhere.
- Search for files by name and content.
- Easily share files and folders with others.
- Quickly view your content.
- Set access levels for who can view, comment, or edit.
- Quickly access recent files.
- See file details and activity.
- Enable viewing of files offline.
- Use your device camera to scan in paper documents.
- Access pictures and videos from Google Photos.

summary: Free online storage from Google.
recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: I like the constant updates. And they come just when I'm having problems. The products are operating good. The issue is when you bring in your second account and it is an account with a different telecom company, mine is outlook, seems like there must be a better way for the network to understand you're the same person. That is my wish list, everything Gboard, Gmail, Assistant, work great, the assistant recognizes one me and two accounts with no problem.

Everything was working fine for years, until latest update. The problem now is that I can't open PDF files. It's freezing and get a black screen. 12-03-2020 I have uninstalled the latest update and everything works fine. Installed again the latest update and nothing is working. I can not access Drive files and can not open PDF files. Please fix it. Thanks

It was a nice app but recently the synchronization has been an issue. Now I open it then it crashes and says "Synchronization error". I have updated and still the same. I can not click on the link to access the link you sent me. Please sort this out urgently and I will change the rate to 5. Answer my comments with why this is happening so all people can see. Not privately. Still the same problem & now I open a new account & there no folders. When I try to delete an acc, says I need my admin....

App was good at one time. It seems like the last year have been nothing but problems. It seems like the more you use it the glitchier it becomes. When using it in the first few minutes it might be fine then after a little while I will get duplicates of the same video which aren't really duplicates at all and if you delete them thinking it's a duplicate your actually deleting something else and it's probably something you really want to keep. Thank goodness the trash has never let me down.

I love using Google drive to store a lot of PDFs and different files to access whenever I need them. Now there is a version management, that uploads a new version of a PDF whenever I just want to look up a page for one minute in Adobe Acrobat, which prevents me from opening a file for a couple of minutes and it KEEPS BREAKING THINGS! I have a dozen or so PDFs where I have to delete all the useless and corrupted versions (on PC, doesn't work on mobile) to even be able to open them again. Pls fix!

title: Mario Kart Tour
description:
■Multiplayer is on the way!
You can race against up to seven other players, whether they're registered as in-game friends, nearby, or scattered around the world.

■ Mario Kart takes a world tour!
Mario and friends go global in this new Mario Kart as they race around courses inspired by real-world cities in addition to classic Mario Kart courses! These destinations will be featured in tours that rotate every two weeks! In addition to courses based on iconic locales, some of your favorite Mario Kart characters will get variations that incorporate the local flavor of cities featured in the game!

■ Endless Mario Kart fun at your fingertips!
The Mario Kart series known and loved by many is ready to take the world by storm – one smart device at a time! With just one finger, you can steer and drift with ease and sling devastating items as you go for the gold in cups filled with new and classic Mario Kart courses.

■ Nab 1st place with items and Frenzy mode!
In Mario Kart Tour you have access to an arsenal of powerful items that can mix things up on the racetrack! Turn up the heat by activating the new Frenzy mode, which gives an unlimited supply of a certain item and makes you invincible! Make the most of the ensuing chaos, as Frenzy mode only lasts a short time!

■ Collect drivers, karts, badges, and more!
Earn Grand Stars by racing or fire off the featured pipe to receive more drivers, karts, and gliders! You can also proudly display badges, earned by completing certain challenges, next to your in-game name!

■ Bonus challenge courses put a twist on traditional races!
In certain races, 1st place isn't always the goal. With names like "Vs. Mega Bowser" and "Goomba Takedown," these bonus challenge courses demand a different approach to gameplay and strategy!

■ Race to increase your online rank!
Boost with the best of 'em! Your high scores will determine how you compare to other players all over the world. Keep practicing and trying out different combinations of drivers, karts, and gliders to increase your score and rise to the top!

Note: A Nintendo Account is required to play Mario Kart Tour.

* Free-to-start; optional in-game purchases available. Persistent Internet, compatible smartphone, and Nintendo Account required. Data charges may apply.
* For information about our ads, please see the “How we use your information” section of the Nintendo Privacy Policy.
* May include advertising.

User Agreement:
https://support.mariokarttour.com/application_eula

© 2019 Nintendo
Mario Kart is a trademark of Nintendo.

summary: Race around the world!
developerAddress: 京都府京都市南区上鳥羽鉾立町11-1
recentChanges: Addressed known issues.
comments: I loved the game and then multiplayer happened. There are serious issues with the multiplayer mode. I dont know if there are hacks going on or not, but I have hit others over and over again with shells and other items, and while in frenzy, and the other racers just keep on going. Meanwhile, I get hit once, and I'm knocked out. It's happening almost every single race. Also, I've come in first place, yet when the results come in, I'm in 2nd, 3rd, etc... Fix these issues.

A few days ago, I was able to start racing in the Ludwig cup in the Baby Rosalina tour. Ever since, the app only loads up the first two races in the cup, so I'm completely unable to even see the last race and the bonus, seeming as if they don't exist. If I reset the app, I will lose all of my progress, so there's nothing I can do. I tried to send this to customer support within the app and got told to "try again later". How am I supposed to play the game when the races don't load up???

This game was awesome when I first got it. I even bought the monthly subscription. An update came and all of a sudden you have to be a professional gamer to win at 150cc and above, or the new multiplayer option. Some days even 100cc is frustrating as hell. It makes you want to throw your phone at the wall when every 10 seconds you get hit by something and crash. I wish I could go back to before the update. I would restart my subscription if that happened.

Was fun until they added multiplayer. I've been having fun with the game for a while but I started doing multiplayer races and it's stupid. Every round I've played has to be full of hackers or something. I'll use an item on someone. It registers as a hit but they dont spin out. Just keep driving. And one time I played a match and someone was somehow just spamming bombs THE ENTIRE TIME. Can you please make a way to report players who are cheating.

Won't start. Loads to 15% then error 806-9090. Cleared cache reinstalled, same thing. Will change review if fixed later. For now I'm going to go be sad because I was looking forward to some Mario Kart. Update 3/17/20:. Was able to install and having a great time with it. Steering is not the same as it used to be, but it's fun once you get used to it.

title: No Ads! Perfect Video Player All Formats KMPlayer
description:
km player is the perfect playback tool that can play all types of subtitles and video.
No ads!! HD video player that can support smartphones and tablets, and play up to 4k, 8k UHD video quality.

Newly updated km player has added various functions such as quick button, video zoom and move, playlist setting, subtitle setting and so on.

▶ Function of km player


High definition video playback: HD, 4K, 8K, UHD, Full HD playback.
Color adjustment: change brightness, contrast, hue, saturation, gamma information
Zoom in video: Zoom in and move the video you're watching
Section repeat: Repeat after section designation
Invert video: Invert left and right (mirror mode), upside down
Quick Button: Select and specify player options with one click
Popup Play: Pop-up windows that can be used with other apps
Equalizer: Use equalizer for music and video
Speed ​​control: Playback speed control function up to 0.25 ~ 4 times
Beautiful UI: beautiful music and video playback UI
Subtitle Setting: Change subtitle color, size, position
Timer function: Video and music timer function


Search function: Search music and video you want
My List (Playlist): Create video and music playlist
Play URL: Play any video on web by entering a URL (Streaming)
External storage device support: Load external storage device (SD card / USB memory)
Network: Private server connection by FTP, UPNP, SMB
Cloud: Play music and content within Google Drive

▶ Support Format

< Video and Music Formats >
AVI, MP3, WAV, AAC, MOV, MP4, WMV, RMVB, FLAC, 3GP, M4V, MKV, TS, MPG, FLV

< Subtitle Format >
DVD, DVB, SSA/ASS Subtitle Track.
SubStation Alpha(.ssa/.ass) with full styling.SAMI(.smi) with ruby tag support.
SubRip(.srt), MicroDVD(.sub/.txt), VobSub(.sub/.idx), SubViewer2.0(.sub), MPL2(.mpl/.txt), TMPlayer(.txt), Teletext, PJS(.pjs) , WebVTT(.vtt)

▶ Access Permission Information


Storage: Request for access to photos, music, and videos stored on the device


Draw on top of other apps: Request permission to use popup play
View and download Google Drive files: Request permission to use the cloud

You can use the basic service even if you do not agree with the selectable permission. 
(However, functions that require selectable permission cannot be used.)

▶ Developer's comment
KMPlayer is the most complete video player.
We listen to your feedback and develop it. Please give us many feature requests and feedback.
KMPlayer's mail is 'support.mobile@kmplayer.com'.
////////////////////
KMPlayer is developed by Flutter. 
Thank you so much, Google.
////////////////////

Perfect free video player.
HD, FHD, UHD, Support for all format files
developerAddress: 11F, DTC Tower, 49, Daewangpangyo-ro 644, Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
recentChanges:
- URL playback performance enhancements
- audio output performance enhancements
Other performance enhancements
comments: A very feature rich player. It has everything one may look for in a video player. However, there's one thing I didn't like is that the UI and purple accent everywhere. Please make UI more visually appealing with options to customise and a library system for video player which shows files with meta data and tags like Netflix. I know that is way over the top one actually look for, but this would make it the best and only player with such features.

This is just ok..video settings by this app is amazing& appreciable👏 but we have to adjust settings for every time in some aspects... Lot of improvements needed.. "remember settings" feature should be included..and manual brightness without depending on system brightness should also be included.. If so.. It will deserve better ratings..

New version is really bad. Please go back to previous version. I can't move forward more than 24 seconds when I swipe right. When the play bar is on I can't move forward or backward at all. "All video" page is a disaster since the clips that I download in Whatsapp or Telegram are shown in there. Exiting the video is so much harder now. KMPlayer is still the best on any platform so fix these problems please!

Love everything about KMplayer! Although, I did discover a minor issue. Player would not play a couple of my AVI movie files. It did play my other AVI files. Also would not play a DIVX movie file. Not a big deal I use another player for those files. Other than that, you guys did a FANTASTIC job with this video player! Thank you!!!!

I've found and used so many video player apps but this player make me so amazing. Adding substitle (especially ass file) into a video made me crazy when I used the old apps but this app can do that easily and quickly with a lot of features and I like that. Everything is good until now.

title: Cartoon Network App
description:
Catch up on the latest full episodes (available the day after they air!) and tons of other awesome videos in the Emmy® award winning Cartoon Network App!

ALL YOUR FAVORITE SHOWS IN ONE PLACE
Watch episodes from hit Cartoon Network shows like Teen Titans Go!, The Amazing World of Gumball, Steven Universe, Infinity Train, We Bare Bears, Craig of the Creek, Ben 10, Clarence, and many more.

WATCH YOUR OWN CUSTOM MIX 
Tell us which shows you like, and we'll build a personalized video mix full of the latest episodes just for you.

SEE UNLOCKED EPISODES—NO LOGIN REQUIRED
Enjoy a selection of full-length episodes from your favorite Cartoon Network shows without any login or authentication. Download the free app and start watching! Just look for the episodes without a key. (Episodes with a key still require your TV provider info.)

APP EXCLUSIVE PREMIERES
Get ahead of the game by watching exclusive premiere episodes before they even hit the air. See it first on the app!
 
Get all your favorite shows on the go with the free CARTOON NETWORK APP!
 
Participating TV providers include AT&T, Charter Spectrum, Cox, Dish, Frontier, Mediacom, PlayStation Vue, Verizon, Xfinity, and many more.

********************

If you're having any problems with this app, feel free to contact us at help@cartoonnetwork.com. Tell us about the issues you're running into as well as what device and OS version you're using.

********************

IMPORTANT CONSIDERATIONS:
* This app may contain ads that feature other products, services, shows or offers from Cartoon Network and our partners.
* Adults must authenticate with their cable or satellite TV provider info to view locked episodes.

PRIVACY INFORMATION: 
Your privacy is important to us at Cartoon Network, a division of Turner Broadcasting System, Inc.  This game collects and uses information as described in Cartoon Network’s Privacy Policy linked below.  This information may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content; serve advertising; perform network communications; manage and improve our products and services; and perform other internal operations of Cartoon Network web sites or online services.  Our privacy practices are guided by data privacy laws in the United States. For users residing in the EU or other countries outside the U.S., please note that this app may use persistent identifiers for game management purposes.  By downloading this application, you accept our Privacy Policy and End User License Agreement, and you give permission for such uses for all users of your device.  The Privacy Policy and End User License Agreement are in addition to any terms, conditions or policies imposed by your wireless carrier and Google, Inc. Cartoon Network and its affiliates are not responsible for any collection, use, or disclosure of your personal information by Google or your wireless carrier.

Terms of Use: http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/legal/termsofuse.html
Privacy Policy: http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/legal/privacy/mobile.html

summary: Watch tons of awesome videos from your favorite Cartoon Network shows!
recentChanges: Don’t miss the brand new ThunderCats Roar! series. Watch it and all your other favorite Cartoon Network shows in the Cartoon Network App.
comments: Currently there is a bug where the app will crash if you try and sign in to your cable provider, which is obviously a big problem. Some other minor issues are a UI which is poorly optimized for anything outside of 16:9 and a lack of an option to pay to remove ads, and you've got yourself a bit of a stinker honestly. This would normally deserve 3 stars but the bug is worth docking an extra one since that's major functionality.

This app is amazing, like if you dont have a tv provider sure it might suck, but if you do have a tv provider then you get to unlock all episodes of whatever show is on cartoon network. If you dont speak english there is a way you can put in your language. 5 star!

HORRIBLE! ABSOLUTE TRASH! only gives you like 2 episodes for each show. The ones that ARE unlocked are in the middle of the season! When I try to log in, the app crashes! Tried to log into it on my Roku tv, but after I completed the online activation, it still didn't log in! DONT INSTALL THIS APP! IT IS AN ABSOLUTE WASTE OF STORAGE!

There are pros and cons. pros: the shows are pretty fun and cool. you can't always watch them on other apps. cons: it usually malfunctions and it's REALLY frustrating. And it takes such a long time to log in! and it's confusing and annoying.

The reason I'm so upset with the carts of Nick word app is because what if you do not have a TV provider, it doesn't give you an option to say, you know English or anything. That is my problem. They could probably do that if they say the app is for free

title: Piano - Play & Learn Music
description:
Piano Crush contains virtual piano games and a musical keyboard with a great variety of musical instrument sounds.

Enjoy cool free piano game! The piano app is the funniest way to play the instrument. Suitable for all ages, no previous piano lessons needed! 

*** Piano Crush features ***

PIANO TILES GAME: Piano games have never looked so realistic! Use the virtual piano keyboard to play anywhere. Tap piano keys under falling tiles and perform like a real pianist, following hints from these music games.  
SONGBOOK: Over 300 piano melodies available! Choose from many styles and genres, from classical to popular repertoire you can instantly play Beethoven’s Symphony #5 or The Animals’ House of the Rising Sun! Categorized library and enhanced search will help you find awesome songs quickly. New piano songs are added every week!
MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS: Make your real piano keyboard sound differently! Change your virtual piano sound to Organ, Violin or even the sound of Electric Guitar. Enjoy the variety and originality of sounds in piano games!        
SHARING: Music is for sharing. Play your piano music, have fun, and share your piano experience and positive vibes! Challenge your friends to beat your highest score!

Turn your device into a luxurious piano keyboard with realistic sound effects and amusing piano games! The app has HD graphics, and all of its sounds are samples of a real instrument. Additional sounds of non-keyboard instruments have been added to make your piano music experience more challenging,  exciting and fun!

HOW TO PLAY NON-KEYBOARD INSTRUMENTS ON PIANO TABS 

Pick a new musical instrument sound and play any piano chords on the virtual keyboard  as you would normally. The app will instantly switch to the selected sound. Enrich your music games experience with this unique feature.

In Piano Crush you can play:
- Grand Piano
- Vintage Piano
- Accordion
- Organ
- Electric Guitar
- Harp
- Harpsichord
- Violin
- Electric Piano
- Vibraphone
- Synthesizer
- Banjo 
- and others
Have fun with piano games and play music with ease!

Privacy Policy: https://gismart.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Service: https://gismart.com/terms-of-service

**** About Gismart ***
Gismart is a team of devoted musicians and developers with real passion for music and everything about it!
Find out more about us: Gismart.com 
Follow us on Twitter/Facebook: @Gismartmusic
Feel free to drop us a line about anything: support@gismart.com

comments: Ok, this is outrageous,you have to pay 90 dollars a year to open the app.The free trial lasts only a couple days.The app isn't even that good and the sync is way off,I sure hope this gets taken down for the terrible price.

This app is sooooooo bad! It doesn't even let you start the program without paying. And it's 90 bucks a month. That is so UNREASONABLE and STUPID. I would never pay that much for a game. Plus I wouldn't even know if what I was paying for because they don't let you see the program before you have to pay. NO WAY I'm DELETING this RIGHT NOW. BYE BYE. If I could rate 0 stars I would.

The tiles don't respond well, which makes the game incredibly hard (It was already had without that problem). Plus could you explain me why you have to pay to play national anthems, unless it's the Russian or American one??? I'm French and English, I was so pissed to see I have to pay almost 80 bucks for my two NATIONAL ANTHEMS? The idea was great, but these problems makes it the worst music game ever. Uninstalled in less than 20 minutes.

As a music lover and a person who plays rhythm games like Guitar Hero and the like, learn from the guys whose formula works. Your game is enjoyable, yes. But the way you've built the system for this game is just going to throw a player's timing off. Either you play a clicker for a player to sync the timing with for the notes, or play the accompaniment to the notes so that a player has something to base their timing on and not just the keys hitting the line. Each player will have a version of a song's speed they may play the notes in their head with, so your formula will not work. You need to provide a basis for the player. A clicker or accompaniment to the notes. And forget about pausing at the notes if a player misses it. That throws off timing as well. If the player misses it, so be it. A player will try again to get the note's timing correct. That's what a rhythm game is.

Terrible game in most aspects. It doesn't even start before showing you an option to purchase, with the button already set to "buy", trying to get you in an expensive as hell subscription of something you didn't even try. It doesn't have an exit for this semi-scam, so eother you accept, spend 5 minutes trying to enter, or restart the app. The game looks ok, but the tiles are terrible. For a musical game, the indication marks are HORRIBLY out of sync. Not recommending this one AT ALL.

Wait for the caller to call out our favorite bingo balls and win the free bingo games online! Play bingo online FREE @ Abradoodle! Feel free to spin to win!
     
Warning: Bingo by Abradoodle is a super addictive free bingo game online!  Why, you ask? Because we’ve got it all!  Cute cats, cuter dogs, free bingo cards, and oh so many absolute bingos! Blitz and bash out bingos with your friends on a wild and fun bingo adventure like there’s no tomorrow! 
Abradoodle Bingo is the free online bingo adventure game that lets you play bingo offline, anywhere, anytime you want, with or without internet. Wifi, no wifi -- who cares??  Not you, because you can play bingo both ways – play bingo offline or play bingo online free!  This online bingo game lets you get bingo hall action anytime you want, because bingo action is way more fun – online bingo and offline bingo games for everyone! Absolute bingos for everyone!

WHAT THIS FREE BINGO GAME HAS TO OFFER - 
 
✪ FUN themes and rooms to explore
✪ GET bingo tickets every 40 minutes
✪ POWERUPS to boost your game
✪ WIN! Great bingo odds
✪ COLLECT daubers and avatars and stamps for bonuses
✪ PLAY up to four bingo cards
✪ MULTI bingo - get double, triple, and mega bingos
✪ CHOOSE teams - are you on Team Hoops or Team Abradoodle?
✪ FRIENDLY and FUN bingo! (Yes, yes we are!)

If you love online bingo and are ready to try a new bingo game that will knock your socks off, load up Abradoodle and get ready for the best bingo game experience.  Best of all, this is a free bingo game!  Pop on over and play this unique bingo game!

So gather up your friends, roll up your sleeves, spin to win, and have fun with the ultimate bingo showdown. This is a bingo journey you don't want to miss! Run, dash, surf, spin or slither on over and let's escape into some online absolute bingo magic! May the best bingo player and best set of bingo cards...bingo!


Follow us to get news and updates:

Got feedback?  Have questions?  Just bored?  Our friendly and ALWAYS caffeinated team is ready to hear it.  Anytime you gotta get something off your chest just shoot our team an email - support@abradoodle.com or send us a message using our in game support center.  Try it out!   We actually respond!

Love us?  We love you too!!  If you're having fun, please write a review.  We read every review and your nice comments gives us warm fuzzies. :)

Don't love us?  Ouch.  Well let us know, because we want to improve!  Email us at support@abradoodle.com and we'll do our very bestest to make things right.  Or at least lose some sleep over thinking about how to. :)

Please note -
The games are intended for an adult audience.

comments: This is how you make a game that I will actually keep on my phone. No intrusive, strange permissions. No "BUY NOW" in my face all the time. The actual game is even fun and addictive. I would play more, but energy tickets are a bit of a *bleh* thing to deal with. Still, I can accept that, being as I did not have to sit through a single ad that I did not initiate (I have watched the ads for tickets when I chose to do so). VERY NICE!!! I probably won't mind spending $$$ here if this keeps up! :)

Very fun and addicting game. Lots of other challenges besides just getting bingos. I like that it doesn't cost alot of coins for the boosters. I would've gave it 5 stars but it won't let me enter my player name or my email address. I'd like to be able to change my player name but when I push "ok" or "done", it just takes me back to the "watch ads" screen. It's very fustrating..

This is my favorite Bingo game out there. Its fair to us, giving us coins to by boosters, tickets to play, chests to open with everything we need inside. It has no limitations. Thanks to the developers who made it possible, I appreciate what you have created. I play it constantly. Also love the avatars that we earn and daubers which we earn also, and all of the color changes for both. It makes us independent!

My all-time favorite bingo game BUT I'm questioning the "random" odds. I have 2 completed sets of stamps waiting on 1 stamp to complete the set and earn the ticket rewards. I've been waiting WEEKS for one stamp. I actually quit playing for awhile out of frustration. I have given it another shot but still no luck. I have collected 932 stamps on this one series alone waiting on ONE STAMP. That's ridiculous in my opinion. How is that possible? Beyond frustrating! I may quit a second time for good.

Its a good pass time but its so Difficult to get a bingo. Usually if 1 more number is needed to get a bingo and there are 14 to 15 more winners left, that number rarely gets called out. The stamps will all get completed but that 1 piece will frustrate you so much to complete the last stamp that you will keep on loosing tkts and you wont get it. My luck could be bad sometimes but not always. Its more annoying than entertaining. I am finally uninstalling.

title: UNO!™
description:
Play the world’s number one card game like never before. UNO!™ has all-new rules, tournaments, adventures and so much more! At home or on the move, jump into games instantly. Whether an UNO!™ veteran or completely new, take on challenges and reap the rewards. UNO!™ is the ultimate competitive family-friendly card game.
-	Play classic UNO!™ or use tons of popular house rules!
-	Connect anytime, anywhere with friends from around the world! 
-	Two heads are better than one in 2v2 mode. Use teamwork to win together.
-	Compete in tournaments. Win rewards. Climb the leaderboards!
-	Go on an adventure in the UNO!™ Universe.
FEATURES
The Classic Game at Your Fingertips
Play the game you know and love in UNO!™ Classic Mode. Or let us recommend the game mode that suits you with Quick Start. Play instantly anytime!

Buddy Up
Work together with your friends in 2v2 Mode. It’s a totally unique way to play with teamwork and more strategy. You win when either you or your partner plays the last card!

Rule Your Room
Get your friends together in the Fun Room and set up a game with your favorite house rules! Play the new “Discard All” card to completely remove one color from your hand. Or use the popular “7-0” house rule to swap hands with someone else. Turn up the pressure with the “Stacking” rule and watch your friends pile cards onto one hapless player! 

Go big or go home. Go WILD.
This no-holds-barred mode is the ultimate UNO!™ challenge. House rules on, two deck play and winnings up to 80 times what you put in! But beware, in this wild scenario, you win big or go home empty handed! Are you up for the challenge?

Tournaments
Climb the ladder and prove your skill in regular tournaments. Keep winning to take the fast route to victory and win prizes.

Journey the UNO!™ Universe
Discover new places, meet new characters, and collect unique rewards. The UNO!™ Universe is an exciting adventure around the world. Follow the story as each chapter unfolds.

Connect, Chat, Yell UNO!™
Easily connect with friends, send voice messages to the other players during a match, or yell UNO into your device when you’re about to win. Make a strategy with your partner in 2v2 mode or cheer on your friends as a spectator!

recentChanges:
This update is all green! It's filled with great deals and an especially lucky event!
- We're celebrating Saint Patrick's Day! Can you find the hidden golden horseshoes?
- Play UNO in two new languages: Korean and Arabic!
- There's a new special treat for April Fools Day. What could it be?
- Take advantage of the new super value deals! New packs available daily, weekly, and monthly!
- Buying larger diamond packs gives you even more bonus diamonds! It's raining diamonds!
comments: The game is actually my favorite game. Normally this would get 5 stars and more if I could. But the customer service is what changed my mind. I play this game, a lot.... I mean A LOT and yes, I actually spend my real money on it. On Friday, I paid 3.99 for the coin bank and was charged and never get the coins. I reached out to customer service not once, not twice but 3 times and no response, not even an automated one. Yes I love the game but taking my money is a huge game changer.

I think the game is just great, its fun to play with your friends in 2v2 or in a room. Its even a good way to make friends on the game and play with them. The only downside of the game is when someone plays a plus two, and you also have something to stack. It should be made to where you can choose to just draw two instead of playing something

Money Trap... It is impossible to win grand prix... You just can't win... And you have to pay 10 diamonds for entrance fee. And guess what, after couple of games you have to pay real money to get more diamonds. I literally tried at least 30 times but not won a single grand prix! There are bots and algorithms in game to just keep you losing...

Game itself is fine, but don't like the way the coins function works. I feel like you should have the option to Free Play where you don't earn or use coins, so it's just for fun. Honestly it kind of rubs me the wrong way how the only way to play a match is basically gambling, especially if you end up having to spend real money to replenish coins.

It's my favourite game, but i'm having a problem that had happened to me 5 times in 2 days. It's the question when they drop +4 and the question was: does the player have a blue card? And i said no. Then when it came his time to play he dropped the only card he had yellow. Game is bugy fix your game! Right now it's the badest game i've played.
